description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Contact' that renders a contact form with input fields for name, email, subject, and message, handles form submission asynchronously, and includes contact details with a WhatsApp quick chat link.

methods.name: Contact()
methods.description: React functional component rendering a contact form with submission handling and contact info.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission asynchronously, updates status state, calls submitContact API, and resets form.
